body_html:
We are starting with Python. Our objective is to minimize changes to C++, but we may have to. We will keep you posted of some of the decisions! Thanks, :- Abhinav
…
On Mon, Jan 30, 2017 at 4:49 PM, Yaroslav Bulatov ***@***.***> wrote: @abhinavvishnu <https://github.com/abhinavvishnu> are you modifying C++ core runtime (ie files like executor.cc) or just the Python parts? Changes to core runtime would take significant effort to integrate since they touch everything. Modifying python parts and compiled code loaded through tf.load_library mechanism are much easier to integrate. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. -- Abhinav Vishnu Research Scientist Pacific Northwest National Lab Richland, WA 99352

body:
We are starting with Python. Our objective is to minimize changes to C++,
but we may have to. We will keep you posted of some of the decisions!

Thanks,

:- Abhinav

On Mon, Jan 30, 2017 at 4:49 PM, Yaroslav Bulatov <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Changes to core runtime would take significant effort to integrate since
> they touch everything. Modifying python parts and compiled code loaded
> through tf.load_library mechanism are much easier to integrate.
